## composeScript() function

Compose multiple script parts and wrap in OmniFocus tell block. Handlers (on...end) go at the top level, body goes in the tell block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function composeScript(handlers: string[], body: string): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter

</th><th>

Type

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

handlers

</td><td>

string\[\]

</td><td>

Array of handler code (on...end blocks)

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

body

</td><td>

string

</td><td>

The main script body to execute within the tell block

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

Complete AppleScript string ready for execution

## Example

```typescript
const jsonHelpers = await loadScriptContent("helpers/json.applescript");
const script = composeScript([jsonHelpers], 'return my jsonString("test")');
```
